Professional and Confident

J.R. (Harvard Law School) and Ash (Berkeley Law) have joined forces to represent wronged California employees. We have specific experience prosecuting and succeeding in the following practice areas:

  • Wrongful Termination
  • Race/Sex Discrimination and Harassment
  • Disability Discrimination
  • Retaliation
  • Wage and Hour Violations
  • Off-The-Clock Work
  • Missed Meal Periods and Rest Breaks
  • Whistleblower Litigation
  • False Claims Act / Qui Tam
  • Government and IRS Fraud
  • Independent Contractor Misclassification
